about_me_description: Since I was a child, I have always been passionate about technology, and today I have the opportunity to express my creativity by doing what I love. Over the past three years, I have been developing and refining my programming skills. I have great experience with both front-end and back-end technologies, including React, TypeScript, Next.js, Node.js, among others. Although my main focus is on front-end development, I am always open to new opportunities to keep learning and exploring new things.
achievements_description: In October 2023, my team, Absolem Coders, won the Local People's Choice award from the Federal Institute of Paraná (IFPR) in Curitiba during the 2023 NASA Space Apps Challenge, the world's largest hackathon.
blaze_clone_description: A functional clone of the Crash game from the Blaze betting platform, with a responsive layout adaptable to mobile devices.
casa_verde_description: The homepage of the fictional online store Casa Verde, specialized in selling plants. It features an integrated email sending service.
did_you_like_what_you_saw: Did you like what you saw?
glossario_libras_description: A learning platform focused on teaching Brazilian Sign Language (Libras) to university students from various courses.
gogreen_description: A landing page developed for raising awareness about climate change and the 13th United Nations Sustainable Development Goal.
linkedin_clone_description: A clone of the LinkedIn profile page with a dark theme. It features a fully responsive layout for various screen sizes.
medicenter_description: The homepage of a responsive and accessible website for the fictional MediCenter medical clinic. It includes an adaptable design for tablets and smartphones.
metamorfose_digital_description: The Metamorfose Digital website, a community project created by university students focused on the proper disposal of electronic waste.
name: name
optimustech_description: A complete job listings page for the fictional technology company OptimusTech. It features a clean, responsive, and professional design.
petmatch_description: A landing page developed for raising awareness about animal abandonment in Brazil, encouraging the download of an app for pet adoption.
popular_movies_description: An application to search and favorite movies in the browser's Local Storage, using the The Movie Database (TMDB) API.
profile_card_component_description: A responsive and stylized card with a user's profile data. It features a variety of different animations.
project_gallery_description: Throughout my journey, I have developed a variety of high-quality products using the latest and most in-demand technologies in the market.
projects_description: Check out some of the projects I have developed
skills_description: Technologies and tools in the market that I have experience with
todo_list_description: A basic and functional To-Do list, with a pleasant design, various filter options, and data saved in the browser's Local Storage.
urna_eletronica_description: Fully functional web simulator of the New Electronic Voting Machine, which was used for the first time in the 2022 Brazilian Elections.
